original_text: The money from the guilt offerings and the money from the sin offerings was not brought into the house of the Lord; it belonged to the priests.
korean_text: 속건제의 은과 속죄제의 은은 여호와의 성전에 드리지 아니하고 제사장에게 돌렸더라

sentences.original_text: The money from the guilt offerings
and the money from the sin offerings
was not brought into the house of the Lord
